member.name: T:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.Viewfinder
member.summary: Viewfinder class, used for manipulating the viewfinder when the system is operating in snapshot mode.

member.name: M:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.Viewfinder.#ctor(Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.ScannerServicesClient)
member.param: The ScannerServicesClient object to use for communicating with Scanner Services.

member.name: M:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.Viewfinder.Start(System.Windows.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Start the video viewfinder and draw it on the specified Control.
member.param: The control to draw the video on.
member.remarks: The settings will take affect either immediately if the system is in snapshot mode, or when snapshot mode is next enabled.

member.name: P:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.Viewfinder.CropRectangle
member.summary: Gets or sets the rectangle used to crop the viewfinder video.

member.name: P:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.Viewfinder.CropStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the display style of the cropped area.

member.name: P:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.Viewfinder.FixAspectRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean flag indicating if the aspect ratio of the viewfinder image is forced to match that of the acquired image.

member.name: T:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.Viewfinder.CropStyles
member.summary: Enumeration of available crop styles to use on the viewfinder.

member.name: F:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.Viewfinder.CropStyles.FILL
member.summary: Use the contents of the cropping rectangle to fill the entire viewfinder window.

member.name: F:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.Viewfinder.CropStyles.LIGHTEN
member.summary: Lighten the area outside the cropping rectangle.

member.name: F:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.Viewfinder.CropStyles.DARKEN
member.summary: Darken the area outside the cropping rectangle.

member.name: F:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.Viewfinder.CropStyles.FRAME
member.summary: Display a frame around the cropping rectangle.

member.returns: The Scanner Services RESULTCODE of the operation.

member.name: T:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.ImagerAttributes
member.summary: ImagerAttributes class, used for getting and setting attributes that are specific to the imager

member.name: M:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.ImagerAttributes.#ctor(Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.ScannerServicesClient)
member.summary: Construct a new imager attributes object
member.param: the ScannerServicesClient object to use for communicating with Scanner Services

member.name: P:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.ImagerAttributes.LinearSecurityLevel
member.summary: Linear security level used during decoding.

member.name: P:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.ImagerAttributes.FocusMode
member.summary: Focus mode to use for imaging.

member.name: P:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.ImagerAttributes.PoorQuality1DMode
member.summary: Allow poor quality 1D barcodes to be read, at the expense of image quality.

member.name: P:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.ImagerAttributes.PicklistMode
member.summary: Allow the imager to decode only the barcode that is directly under the cross-hair/reticule (+) part of the AIM pattern.
member.remarks: This feature is most useful in applications where multiple barcodes may appear in the field of view during a decode session and only one of them is targeted for decode. If AimMode if set to AimModes.None, AimModes.Reticule will be used. Enabling this feature may adversely affect overall decoding performance.

member.name: P:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.ImagerAttributes.CropRectangle
member.summary: Allow poor quality 1D barcodes to be read, at the expense of image quality.

member.summary: Enumeration of result codes from Scanner Services.

member.name: F:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.RESULTCODE.E_OK_NO_DATA
member.summary: The operation succeeded, but there was no data returned.

member.name: F:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.RESULTCODE.E_PARSE_ERR
member.summary: There was an error parsing the label.

member.name: F:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.RESULTCODE.E_CONVERT_ERR
member.summary: There was an error converting the label.

member.name: F:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.RESULTCODE.E_OUTOFMEM
member.summary: There was not enough memory to complete the operation.

member.name: F:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.RESULTCODE.E_INVALID_PARAM
member.summary: There was an invalid parameter specified for the operation.

member.name: F:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.RESULTCODE.E_DISPATCH_ERR
member.summary: The was an error dispatching the data.

member.name: F:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.RESULTCODE.E_TRANSMIT_ERR
member.summary: The was an error transmitting the data to the host.

member.name: F:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.RESULTCODE.E_NO_RESOURCE_ERR
member.summary: The were insufficient resources available to perform the operation.

member.name: F:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.RESULTCODE.E_INCORRECT_MODE
member.summary: The API session does not have the required decode permissions.

member.name: F:Symbol.MT2000.ScannerServices.RESULTCODE.E_ATTR_ACCESS_DENIED
member.summary: Access denied for the attempted attribute operation.
